arts.ttl: Video: Milan loanee Morata scores on Galatasaray debut

arts.ttl: Galatasaray sign Lemina from Wolves for £2m
arts.sum: Galatasaray sign Gabon midfielder Mario Lemina from Wolves in a £2m (2.5m euros) deal.

arts.ttl: Lyon turn down Galatasaray’s Clinton Mata bid
arts.sum: According to a report from L’Équipe, Olympique Lyonnais have turned down an offer from Turkish side Galatasaray for defender Clinton Mata (32). Whilst the transfer window in France has now closed some…

arts.ttl: Galatasaray say talks with Wolves' Lemina under way
arts.sum: Galatasaray say they have opened negotiations with Wolves and Mario Lemina over a potential transfer for the Gabon midfielder.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray Linked With Move For Empoli’s Goglichidze
arts.sum: The Italian transfer window may have closed on February 4, but the Turkish market remains open until February 11, keeping Serie A clubs on alert for potential outgoing transfers. Galatasaray, in particular, continues to scout talent in Italy, with their sights set on Empoli's promising defender, Saba Goglichidze. The post Galatasaray Linked With Move For Empoli’s Goglichidze appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Source: Galatasaray keen on Newcastle's Trippier
arts.sum: Galatasaray are pushing to sign Newcastle United defender Kieran Trippier, a source has told ESPN.

arts.ttl: Why Arsenal didn't sign a striker in January and how Alexander Isak could make them regret it
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta was frustrated in his chase for a striker with Isak, who fired Newcastle into a Carabao Cup semi-final first leg lead, among those deemed impossible to sign

arts.ttl: Galatasaray keen on Empoli’s Saba Goglichidze
arts.sum: Turkish giants Galatasaray are no strangers to hunting for players in Serie A and they are now keen on Empoli’s Saba Goglichidze. The Georgian was close to joining Roma on…
